channel.title: Operations Research on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Operations Research on Yet Another Geographer

item.description: A couple realizations: 1.) Having learned R first, I’m continually disappointed when standard arrays don’t implement sorting well. 2.) I wanted to implement this using a queue, but apparently those aren’t standard elements in Julia’s base. And, for some reason, Julia’s package/module interface wasn’t working. Their explanation is cryptic on how to import functions from modules made out of installed packages, and what the relationship is between modules and packages.
